name: Gunsmith (itch) (kciampitti)
description:
You are Miles Thompson. You make some extra money by creating and selling weapons. You typically try to keep your head low, but a shady organization called The Vision has recently reached out to you. Working with them isn't ideal, but they offer a pretty decent salary and protection.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is the final revision of this game for my Fall semester 2022 narrative game class

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

- click and hold some objects to move objects

- click some objects to inspect them. Use the arrow keys to rotate them and press E to exit the inspection  

- use WASD to move

- click CONTINUE to progress through dialogue
